snippet: A 36-year-old man was arrested after he admitted aiming a laser at aircraft Monday night, injuring the eyes of three pilots — including two officers in a New York Police Department helicopter.
abstract: Bronx man Frank J Egan is arrested for shining powerful hand-held laser at planes approaching La Guardia airport, injuring eyes of four pilots; charges include assault on police officer, felony assault, reckless endangerment and criminal possession of weapon.

byline.original: By AL BAKER and WINNIE HU
byline.contributor: Kate Pastor and Nate Schweber contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: A 36-year-old man was arrested after he admitted aiming a laser at aircraft Monday night, injuring the eyes of three pilots — including two officers in a New York Police Department helicopter.

headline.main: Bronx Man Accused of Shining Laser Beam at Planes
headline.print_headline: Bronx Man Accused of Shining Laser Beam at Planes

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Laser (Light Amplification by Stimulated Emission of Radiation)
